name: The InvestiGator
description:
Update V1.1 - Fixed a bug with items in crates, tweaked the audio and visuals slightly and added a browser version, enjoy!

Find all the crates, collect all the items and identify the thief!

Made for JimJam2018 in 48 hours.

Software used: Unity3d, Paint.net and all audio from FreeSounds.org.

I'm a solo developer who's spent the last year and half learning the Unity engine and Csharp.
